title: Lithographs from the Tamarind Workshop, L.A.
description: This exhibit featured lithographs exclusively from the Tamarind Lithography Workshop in Los Angeles, which was conceived of by artist June Wayne. June Wayne founded Tamarind with the intent of trying to revive American lithographic prints, which she felt had somewhat been neglected in the years leading up to Tamarind’s founding. The exhibit featured over thirty-five American artists including Richard Diebenkorn, Misch Kohn, and Joyce Treiman.

input: Lithographs from the Tamarind Workshop, L.A.
